title: 2020 Italian Basketball Supercup
text:
The 2020 <a href="Italian%20Basketball%20Supercup">Italian Basketball Supercup</a> (), also known as <a href="Eurosport">Eurosport</a> Supercoppa 2020 for sponsorship reasons, is the 26th edition of the <a href="super%20cup">super cup</a> tournament, organized by the <a href="Lega%20Basket%20Serie%20A">Lega Basket Serie A</a> (LBA).
For the first time in history, all the teams of LBA took part in the Supercup, due to the early conclusion of the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20LBA%20season">2019–20 season</a> caused by <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic%20in%20Italy">COVID-19 pandemic</a>.
